text: It is okay to be lost. It means you are finding your own way, not just following someone else's. 🦋

text: The stars are only visible when it is dark enough. 🌌

author: Queen Elizabeth II

text: Healing doesn’t mean the damage never existed. It means the damage no longer controls our lives. 🩹

text: Tears are words that need to be written. 🖤

text: Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life. ❤️‍🩹

text: The darker the night, the brighter the stars. 🔭

text: It hurts because it mattered. 🕯️

text: Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes, including you. 🩹
